title: Power your next adventure with BLUETTI’s Black Friday deals
content:

Power your next adventure with BLUETTI’s Black Friday deals

Much as the appeal of cycling is built around the sense of freedom that comes from exploring the world on two wheels, technology plays an increasing role in where we ride, how far and what we do when we get there.

With BLUETTI’s range of portable power stations you can keep all your electronics fully charged and ready to use, from e-bike batteries to smartphones and GPS computers, giving you the convenience and peace of mind of power on the go no matter how far off-grid your two-wheeled adventures take you.

And with up to 45% off in BLUETTI’s Black Friday sale, now is the perfect time to pick up the perfect holiday gift for yourself or the cyclist you love.

• Save up to 45% in BLUETTI’s Black Friday sale

Portable power on the go

For more than a decade now, BLUETTI has been leading the way in developing portable power solutions designed for outdoor use that are not only affordable but environmentally responsible. Its wide range of power stations are ideal for remote workers, campers and holiday makers, providing a reliable source of power for when you’re off the grid.

For cyclists in particular, the BLUETTI range includes options such as the EB3A, which is portable enough to carry with you on bikepacking adventures. And with the rise of e-bikes, carrying a portable source of power with you is the perfect antidote to range anxiety, allowing you to lean on the motor’s electrical assistance with the peace of mind that you can recharge on the go without needing access to a power outlet when the battery runs low. Regardless of your e-bike’s existing battery capacity, a BLUETTI portable power station is the perfect range extender.

Whether it’s a bikepacking trip, a campervan adventure, a picnic or a more extended trip off the grid, BLUETTI has the power solution to suit. Let’s take a closer look at some of the products it offers:

BLUETTI EB3A portable power station

While most of BLUETTI’s portable power stations are compact enough to tuck away in the boot of a car or in a campervan, the EB3A is genuinely capable of being carried on a bike as part of your bikepacking kit – especially if you have the power assistance of an electric motor to offset the weight.

Not that it’s heavy – at 4.6kg it’s hardly a lead weight, and its dimensions of 255 x 180 x 183mm means it won’t take up too much space on a rack either. In return it has a 268Wh capacity, and thanks to the 600W AC pure sine wave inverter with 1,200W surge, you can power anything up to a small refrigerator, with eight outlets on board so you can charge multiple devices at once.

• Buy the Bluetti EB3A portable power station for £189 (save £60)

BLUETTI AC70 portable power station

The BLUETTI AC70 provides the ideal balance between power and portability for anyone who needs reliable power on the go. With its 768Wh capacity and 1,000W inverter, it’s the perfect partner to keep everything from phones, bike computers and laptops to cameras, drones and e-bikes fully charged so you can get the most out of any camping or cycling trip off the beaten track.

It weighs just 10.2kg, delivers continuous power and has multiple outlets to connect various appliances at once. The unit itself charges to 80% capacity in just 45 minutes, while it can handle high-power resistive loads up to 2,000W to charge energy-intensive devices with ease thanks to the Power Lifting Mode controlled via the BLUETTI app.

• Buy the Bluetti AC70 portable power station for £449 (save £200)

BLUETTI AC180 portable power station

For a truly flexible power solution for travellers, remote workers or camping adventurers, look no further than the BLUETTI AC180. Its massive 1,152Wh is sufficient to keep a car fridge running for over 15 hours, and with Power Lifting Mode on hand to boost output to as much as 2,700W, powering energy-intensive devices such as hair dryers and even electric blankets is no problem at all.

The AC180 can be charged using AC outlet, solar power, car or generator, and its convenient handheld design makes it easy to carry around too. Plus, thanks to Bluetooth connectivity you can use the BLUETTI app to monitor your power use remotely, manage power consumption and receive updates automatically.

• Buy the Bluetti AC180 portable power station for £549 (save £350)

The BLUETTI difference

The BLUETTI range extends far beyond just the power stations themselves. The company also offers companion solar panels, expansion packs and other accessories to cater for anyone’s portable power needs.

The company’s commitment to energy efficiency and sustainable environmental practices is clear to see throughout its product range – not only are its power stations safe and reliable, but they’re backed by extended warranties and are built to last as long as your sense of adventure.
